Totally recommended for anyone to play. An example of a good and simple game, from the era when the games were focused on bringing a smile to our faces, rather than reaching to our pockets for money.

I am a 55 year old biker and trucker father, and probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I loaded into the game and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my son many happy memories.

Thank you

150185244.review:
[h1] Plants vs. Zombies: La simplicidad de un clásico [/h1]

Plants vs. Zombies, es una de esas joyas atemporales que demuestra que la simplicidad muchas veces puede ser extraordinaria. Este juego de estrategia y defensa de torres se ha ganado un lugar especial en el de muchos jugadores.

[b] Un concepto simple, una diversión infinita [/b]

El corazón de Plants vs. Zombies es un concepto bastante simple pero genial: defender tu casa del ataque de hordas de zombies usando plantas con habilidades únicas. Esta mecánica aparentemente sencilla se convierte en una estrategia profunda y desafiante a medida que avanzas, introduciendo nuevas plantas y zombies en cada nivel.

[b] Variedad de Plantas y Zombis [/b]

La diversidad de personas que encontramos en el juego es impresionante. Cada planta tiene habilidades únicas, desde lanzar guisantes, servir de antorcha para que los guisantes se incendien, hasta ser una nuez que servirá como barrera defensiva. En el otro lado, los zombis se vuelven cada vez más astutos y resistentes. Esta variedad mantiene fresca la jugabilidad a medida que avanzan los niveles y le va aumentando el desafío poco a poco, lo cual te obliga a ir variando tu estrategia.

[b] Jugabilidad adictiva [/b]

La progresión del juego está perfectamente equilibrad, ofreciendo nuevos desafíos y mecánicas a un ritmo que mantiene el interés sin abrumar al jugador. La capacidad de planificar y ajustar estrategias proporciona una sensación gratificante a medida que ves crecer tu jardín.

[b] Humor encantador [/b]

El humor peculiar de Plants vs. Zombies es una de sus características más distintivas. Desde los comentarios divertidos de Crazy Dave hasta las animaciones extravagantes de los zombis, el juego nunca pierde su toque humorístico. Este elemento cómico añade una capa adicional de disfrute a la experiencia.

[b] Estilo visual [/b]

Aunque lanzado en 2009, y la resolución del juego no le favorece al observarlo en un monitor actual, el estilo visual de Plants vs. Zombies ha envejecido muy bien. Los gráficos caricaturescos y colores vibrantes dan vida a este mundo único y contribuyen a su atmósfera distintiva, estos no solo ofrecen una estética encantadora, sino que también añaden un toque de humor y personalidad a cada personaje, con zombis torpes y plantas con expresiones simpáticas.

[b] Modos de juego variados [/b]
Desde el clásico modo de aventura hasta los desafíos en mini-juego, los puzzles, supervivencia infinita, Jardín Zen y más; Plants vs. Zombies ofrece una variedad de modos que mantienen la experiencia fresca y emocionante.

[b] Música del juego [/b]

La música es contagiosa y distintiva, dándole vida a cada nivel con melodías pegajosas que se adaptan a la temática del juego. No solo contribuye al encanto y humor del título, sino que también sirve como un indicador hábil de los cambios de intensidad. Estas composiciones no solo enriquecen la experiencia de juego, sino que también han dejado una impresión duradera, convirtiéndose en parte integral de la identidad de este juego.

[b] Precio [/b]

En ofertas el juego cuesta 1 dólar. [u] ¡No te lo puedes perder! [/u]

[b] Conclusión [/b]

Plants vs. Zombies no solo es un hito en el género de defensa de torres, sino que también es un recordatorio de que los juegos simples pueden ser increíblemente divertidos y duraderos. Con su combinación única de estrategia, humor y jugabilidad adictiva, este juego sigue siendo un clásico atemporal que ha dejado una marca duradera en la industria de los videojuegos.

150141029.review: I am a 35 year old christian father of two children. I was never interested in video games and restricted my children to play them. I live my whole life in a spontaneous cycle, I work at the office 9-5 from Monday-Friday, I go to church on Sundays with my family, and have a neighborhood barbecue in my yard on Saturdays. My children, Andy and Sally, have been pleading for me to get this game on the family computer for years, and for Andy's birthday, I purchased It and allowed him to play for 30 minutes every day. One day, on Sunday after church, I was curious, and gave the game a try. It was so invigorating I couldn't stop playing. I kept playing through the whole day, and well into the night, my wife, Rachel, was concerned and shut the computer off. I came to my senses and went to bed. But through the night, I couldn't sleep. I couldn't stop thinking about strategies on how I could improve my Plants VS Zombies skill. I sneaked out of my bedroom and continued playing, I kept playing until the next day when I had work. I was tired through work and kept thinking about Plants VS Zombies. I installed the game on my work computer, and played through the week. I did not get an ounce of work done the entire week, when the weekend came, we had our barbecue in the backyard, but I would sneak into the bathroom and play on my phone. I played through the entire night and well into the next day, skipping church. I came into work on Monday and my boss told me that I haven't been doing work, and he was laying me off. I went home and locked myself in my office and continued playing for the next week. Only opening the door when my wife made dinner and gave it to me. During intercourse, she was yelling at me for playing "Loonboon" and saying that I was going to eat her brains. She then put some papers on my desk, asking for a divorce. I signed them, of course, then its more time for me to play my favorite game, Plants VS Zombies. The court ruled that she should have full custody of Andy and Sally, and during this court session, I was playing Plants VS Zombies on my phone. After this, I went home and played Plants VS Zombies for 10 hours, without food or water. I was then sent to hospital after my mother came in and found me passed out due to dehydration at my desk. 10/10 game. Would divorce my wife again.

150134184.review:
Receta de ñoquis de papa, los clásicos del 29

Rinde: 4 porciones

Ingredientes
1 kg de papa
300 gr de harina 0000
1 huevo
sal y pimienta

Como hacer ñoquis de papa paso a paso
Lo primero que vamos a hacer lavar bien las papas ya que las vamos a hervir con cáscara. Esto es muy importante para que luego los ñoquis de papa no se desarmen, ya que al cocerlas con cáscara evitamos que absorban agua en exceso. Hacemos un corte horizontal por todo el contorno de la papa, en el video se ve bien, y las llevamos a una olla con agua. Cocinar hasta que al pincharlas se caigan.
Las retiramos y las dejamos enfriar sólo para no quemarnos. Con el corte que hicimos, la cáscara tiene que salir muy fácil en dos partes.
Pisamos las papas todavía en caliente como todo puré digno, agregamos sal, pimienta y mezclamos super bien. Agregamos el huevo batido y la harina. No le vamos a agregar toda la harina de una, nos vamos a guardar un poco para ver cómo viene. Las cantidades son más bien proporcionales, puede ser que la papa haya absorbido más agua o que el huevo sea más chico, así que vamos a agregar la harina de a poco.
Unir con la mano hasta que se pueda pasar hasta la mesada y terminar de integrar. Si en este paso ven que hace falta más harina, tenemos el resto para agregar. No es necesario amar mucho, la idea es llegar a una masa unida y uniforme sin tocarla mucho.
Cortar tiras de masa y hacer chorricitos o rollitos, y cortar trocitos de unos 2 o 3 cm de ancho, pueden enharinar el cuchillo para que sea más fácil.
Ahora viene la magia, vamos a pasarlos por la herramienta para darle forma a los ñoquis de papa de arriba hacia abajo. También pueden usar un tenedor enharinado que también les deja una forma similar. Colocarlos en una placa enharinada sin que se toquen para que no se pegoteen. Y claro, también pueden hacerlos sin la herramienta y simplemente que queden en su versión más rústica.
Para la cocción, llevar de a tandas a una olla con agua hirviendo con sal. Van a ver que se caen al fondo. Cuando suben, los dejan 1 minuto y ya están listos!

Plants vs Zombies is undoubtedly an iconic staple out of all PopCap games. My earliest memories playing this game was on a PC/CD GOTY edition that came with a Disco Zombie collectable figurine. I vaguely remember owning a version of it on the Nintendo DS too at some point. Unfortunately, the CD copy I owned no longer works, so to relive that nostalgia I resorted to purchasing the game here on Steam.

It's incredible that PVZ is already steadily approaching 15 years. Despite the game releasing back in May 2009, it still holds up remarkably well to this day! It goes without saying that PVZ is certainly one of the highest quality games to come out of its time—and it definitely shows! The characters themselves are simple yet memorable, and the soundtrack for this game is phenomenal! The GOTY award was absolutely deserved!

149684043.review:
[h1]Notes[/h1]
I've already played this when I was younger, so my experience may differ from someone playing the game for the first time.

[h1]Overview[/h1]
This game is a classic, I remember playing it when I was very young, it was possibly my first contact with the tower defense genre, and playing it again now that I'm grown was a really nice experience. The game has an humorous take on the zombie survival genre, you'll have to use plants to defend your house from zombie hordes so you can avoid having your brain eaten, with your only help being your crazy neighbor and the plants themselves.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
This is a lane-based tower defense game, you'll have to collect sun and use it to plant a variety of plants to defend your house from the coming zombie waves, each plant and zombie have their own particular gimmick, which you'll have to keep in mind when planting your defense lines. As the story progresses you'll unlock new plants, be attacked by new varieties of zombies and will have to defend different parts of your yard, there's also some minigame levels, which have some different rules specific to them.

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
The game features 2D stylized cartoony graphics, really fitting to the humorous and lighthearted atmosphere of the game.

[h1]Audio[/h1]
This game has one of the best soundtracks in videogame history, it's even hard to believe a cartoony tower defense game has such great music, both main levels and minigames have great and highly enjoyable melodies, my particular favorites being "Graze the Roof" and "Cerebrawl". As for the sound effects, they are simple, sometimes even generic, but they fit well with the game's humorous atmosphere.

[h1]Price[/h1]
It's fairly cheap considering its good quality, which is actually fair since this is an old game.

[h1]Difficulty[/h1]
The game is quite easy, requiring only basic strategy and some attention, so you may easily play it casually without any stress. I don't remember ever having a hard time with this game even when I was younger, so maybe this is a good option for people who want to play a tower defense but have no experience with the genre. The minigames featured in the game are also easy, some are challenging but nothing impossible, unless you're doing the "endless" ones, which will get harder and harder until they become impossible.

[h1]Duration[/h1]
It is a bit short by itself, but there's a lot of post-ending content, such as minigames and unlockables that help to extend your playtime a bit further.

[h1]Replayability[/h1]
After finishing the game you'll be able to restart it with all plants you've unlocked, this new game+ will be a bit harder and is necessary for some achievements, it is also a nice way to test the new plants unlocked after the ending. The game allows you to replay as much as you want, with each replay being a bit harder than the last.

[h1]Achievements[/h1]
Most achievements are quite easy to get, and the game even has a list keeping track of it so you don't have to leave the game to see which ones you're missing. However, there are two that are extremely hard due to being almost pure RNG, they are "China Shop" and "Better Off Dead".

[h1]Problems[/h1]
[list]
[*]Mushrooms are not actually plants, but well, in the game even the plant pots are plants, so its not like it's trying to be realistic in the first place.

[*]Unfortunately, they removed Michael Jackson zombie, but there's a Disco Zombie replacing it.
[/list]

Como no se Reseñar juegos aca les dejo la receta de un bizcochuelo casero y esponjoso
Ingredientes para cocinar un bizcochuelo casero (6 personas):

3 huevos

1 taza de aceite neutro

50ml de leche

1 taza de azúcar

2 tazas de harina 0000

1 cucharadita de polvo para hornear

ralladura de 1 limón o esencia de vainilla

azúcar glas

Paso a paso de la preparación: cómo cocinar bizcochuelo casero:

Batir el aceite neutro con el azúcar en un bol hasta que tome una consistencia blanda.

Añadir los 3 huevos. Mezclar muy bien hasta asegurarse de que quede bien incorporado.

Agregar la harina, leche y ralladura del limón/esencia de vainilla. Mezclar durante algunos minutos.

Tomar un molde, enmantecarlo y luego cubrirlo con un poco de harina. Esto es para que el bizcochuelo no se pegue.

Una vez que la mezcla quede homogénea, introducirla en el molde.

Prender el horno en una temperatura de 180º y poner el molde durante 45 minutos, aproximadamente.

Retirar el molde y esperar a que se enfríe durante varios minutos.

Una vez que el molde se termine de enfríar, retirar el bizcochuelo con cuidado.

Espolvorear con azúcar glas la superficie del bizcochuelo.

¡Listo! Ya tenés un fabuloso bizcochuelo casero para comer en familia o con amigos

149257570.review:
This game is a timeless classic. It has a cute and sometimes funny art style. The game runs smoothly and plays well, and it's especially nice for its smaller size. The fact that the game is only $5 nowadays astonishes me. I would encourage that anyone who wants to have some fun playing the peak game of 2009 deserves to try this at least once. It has lots of replayability, and lots of fun ways to keep trying out the game. I'd say you could easily have two to three whole days (48-72 hours) of stuff to do straight, and it's surprisingly when most big games today can't even manage a play time like that. I also prefer this version far more over the mobile version which simply just can't compete. 

This game is full of charm, fun mechanics, and little Easter eggs scattered about it. It's a great game for everyone and anyone!

(Note: I did play this game when it originally came out back in 2009, soooo I might be biased with some nostalgia lol)

149182767.review:
"Plants vs. Zombies" stands as a timeless masterpiece in the world of video games, seamlessly blending addictive gameplay, strategic depth, and charming aesthetics into an experience that captivates players across all ages. With a unique concept and flawless execution, this game has earned its place as a legendary title in the gaming realm.

At its core, "Plants vs. Zombies" is an ingenious fusion of tower defense and strategy, inviting players into an immersive world where the undead march against a quaint, suburban home. What sets this game apart is its delightful approach: players defend their home by strategically planting an array of lovable plants, each with its own special abilities, to fend off waves of comically animated zombies.

The game's brilliance lies in its simplicity. The mechanics are easy to grasp yet challenging to master, ensuring both casual gamers and seasoned players find themselves entranced by its intricacies. The gradual introduction of new plants and zombies keeps the gameplay fresh and exciting, constantly requiring players to adapt and evolve their strategies.

Visually, "Plants vs. Zombies" is a treat. Its vibrant and whimsical art style brings the characters to life in a way that is both adorable and hilarious. The playful design of the plants and the caricatured zombies add a layer of charm that is rare to find in the gaming world. Each plant's distinct characteristics and the diverse assortment of zombies are wonderfully detailed, enhancing the overall immersive experience.

The soundtrack is a testament to the game's excellence. The catchy tunes and sound effects not only complement the gameplay but also contribute to the game's overall atmosphere, creating a world that's as delightful to listen to as it is to behold.

Beyond its entertainment value, "Plants vs. Zombies" offers a perfect balance of fun and challenge. As players progress through the levels, they encounter varying landscapes and unique challenges that keep the game dynamic and engaging. The strategic element, coupled with a touch of humor, elevates the gaming experience to a level of sheer brilliance.

Moreover, its accessibility across multiple platforms has made it a household name, bringing joy to countless players around the world. Whether on a computer, a gaming console, or a mobile device, the game retains its magic, making it an integral part of the gaming community.

In summary, "Plants vs. Zombies" isn't just a game; it's a work of art. Its seamless blend of engaging gameplay, delightful visuals, and strategic depth, all wrapped in a whimsical package, cements its status as a true gaming masterpiece. It has left an indelible mark on the gaming industry and continues to be a shining example of what a perfect video game looks like.

este juego hizo que me lloren las lagrimas de lo bueno que es, me sorprende que una mecanica tan facil sea tan hermosa como una milanesa asi que voy una receta de una milanesaómo hacer Milanesa

600 grs. de posta negra (4 bistec de 150 grs. cada uno)
3 huevos
1 taza de harina sin polvos
1 taza de pan rallado
½ taza de aceite para freír
Sal y pimienta a gusto
Papel absorbente

Ver lista de compra
Preparación

Golpear un poco cada bistec para romper la fibra y ablandarlos. Reservar.
En un bol, batir el huevo y salpimentar a gusto.
Apanar cada bistec pasándolos primero por harina, luego por el huevo batido, nuevamente por harina, a continuación por el huevo y finalmente por el pan rallado.
En una sartén a fuego medio, calentar el aceite freír por cada lado durante 2 minutos o hasta que los bistec estén dorados.
Retirar del aceite y disponer en un plato con papel absorbente para retirar el exceso de aceite. Servir de inmediato.

147875941.review:
This game saved my life.

I am 27.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ing minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.

After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

147241300.review:
Today's menu has brains! But for the more squeamish we've got plants, like green plant and other green plant and nut and legume. I'll be real here, this isn't just a simple game, it is quite possibly the Magnum Opus of PopCap Games Inc. and stands as a testament to gaming.

No contest, no joke, no triple A title either. This one game a brilliant footprint in gaming culture. I'll save the praises for later, for now I'll just say that the gameplay itself is actually quite one dimensional, if not 1.5 dimensions. All you really to is plant and watch what happens. Really that is just it, PVZ is an overglorified screensaver. That said, it is for that reason as to why I praise it so highly.

Even back before PVZ there were quite a lot of games that tried to hard to be something they weren't when they should've just focused on being a game, something to play. So much arrogance and competition. Gaming culture has always had a reputation for being toxic, while often quite exaggerated it echos even to this day. Try playing an FPS game where you don't get shot the second you show your hitbox. Try playing any phone game where you aren't bombarded by ads every minute. Have you ever liked playing a game meant to be frustrating and then end up frustrated? How about those "games" that want you throw hundreds, if not even thousands of dollars just to get by? And a decade later we now have triple A games that are completely broken on start that cost the same and a run to the grocery store. There is an inherit fatal flaw to all these, they are all just not fun.

Meanwhile at the very rock bottom of gaming we have Plants Vs Zombies, a game that doesn't hate the player. A game from a bygone era, notice there isn't a single ad in sight, no nothing to get in your way besides just doing the one thing this game wants you to do. That is watch. Even by the time it gets to be its hardest is literally after you beat the game (Or at least the main course.). Did I also mention it's a whole 4.99 dollars and after that you don't even need to spend a penny to unlock anything or subscribe to a service.

This game does what so many other games fail to do because it is fun and it isn't hard to make something fun. Any game can demand you to get down and dirty, its one thing to challenge your player but it is another to demand mastery. I seriously doubt no matter how perfect you may be at playing the hardest of the hard games that it will give you the same joy that this can give any kid who played this growing up.

All in all this game is a humble reminder for all gamers as to what a real game is. And yes, this is in fact a game (If not even one of the greatest ever made, [i]ever.[/i]). That humility is what makes it a masterpiece of gaming and perhaps even of the 21st century. So go on, play Plants vs. Zombies. Play it knowing that when you can't make much out of any other game out there this will always be here (At least until the Sun fries everything electric one day but until then you will always have this.).

10/10 Better a plant today than a zombie tomorrow.

147045312.review:
Plants vs. Zombies: GOTY Edition Review

PopCap in a distribution deal covering the UK, many of PopCap’s games are getting a re-print in a new edition. Plants vs. Zombies has been given such a makeover with game of the year edition discs now circling around your favourite retailers. With the game now being old, is it still relevant and worth your cash?

Some games just seem like they’re going to tickle your fancy before you’ve even played them. PVZ is one such game, with a title that instantly grants you insight into its jovial and humorously ludicrous aspects. The main premise involves you planting various foliage on your front lawn to push back the zombie horde and prevent them from invading your house. You need to utilize various plants that each posses unique abilities ranging from offensive firepower, defensive walls and plants that give you sun energy that is require to plant even more greenery. The Zombies too come in different varieties that give them different abilities, strengths and weaknesses. With only a limited amount of plant types you can take with you to each stage and a vast amount of positions you can place them on your lawn, the strategy comes thick and fast. Overall game still alive

Thanks my homie to gift me masterpiece

Plants vs. Zombies is beautifully made. The graphics, audio, soundtrack, gameplay, and even the occasional glitches are all worth appreciating. The game incorporates many fun, charming features that, given time for discovery, turn an initial impression of simplicity into an appreciation for complexity. With multiple game modes, achievements, and the zen garden, Plants vs. Zombies offers much to ensure the concept can be enjoyed to it's greatest potential.

I originally played Plants vs. Zombies for the Nintendo DS close to when it was initially released. Returning to this game after years of hiatus has reinvigorated a deep feeling of nostalgia. Plants vs. Zombies is one of the greatest games ever made.

146092866.review:
El comunismo es un sistema político y económico que ha sido objeto de un extenso debate y controversia a lo largo de la historia. Sus críticos han planteado una serie de preocupaciones y objeciones que se han convertido en argumentos fundamentales en contra de este sistema. A continuación, profundizaré en estas críticas para brindarte una comprensión más completa:

Falta de incentivos y motivación: Uno de los argumentos centrales contra el comunismo es que tiende a socavar los incentivos y la motivación individual para trabajar duro y ser productivo. En un sistema donde los recursos se distribuyen de manera igualitaria y no se permite la acumulación de riqueza personal, algunas personas pueden sentir que no tienen razón para esforzarse más allá de lo mínimo necesario. Esta falta de incentivos puede llevar a una disminución de la productividad y la innovación.

Planificación centralizada y falta de eficiencia: En muchos sistemas comunistas, la planificación económica se lleva a cabo de manera centralizada por el Estado. Esto puede resultar en ineficiencias económicas, ya que es difícil para un grupo pequeño de planificadores comprender y gestionar eficazmente las necesidades y preferencias de una población diversa y en constante cambio. Los mercados y la competencia, que a menudo están ausentes en sistemas comunistas, pueden ser más efectivos para asignar recursos de manera eficiente.

Falta de libertades individuales: En muchos regímenes comunistas históricos, se han restringido las libertades individuales en nombre de la estabilidad y la unidad del Estado. La censura, la represión política y la falta de libertad de expresión pueden ser comunes en estos sistemas. Esto puede llevar a la falta de diversidad de opiniones y a la represión de la disidencia.

Historial de abusos y represión: Uno de los puntos más fuertes en contra del comunismo es su historial de abusos de los derechos humanos. En regímenes comunistas notorios como la Unión Soviética bajo Stalin, la China de Mao Zedong y Camboya bajo los Jemeres Rojos, se han documentado purgas, campos de trabajo forzado, ejecuciones masivas y represión política. Estos abusos han dejado una marca indeleble en la percepción del comunismo en todo el mundo.

Ineficiencia económica y escasez: La falta de incentivos para la producción y la innovación en los sistemas comunistas a menudo ha resultado en escasez de bienes y servicios. Los ciudadanos pueden encontrarse con dificultades para obtener productos básicos, como alimentos y medicamentos. Esta ineficiencia económica puede afectar negativamente la calidad de vida de la población.

Problemas de corrupción: La concentración de poder en el Estado en los sistemas comunistas puede llevar a la corrupción y al mal uso de los recursos. La élite gobernante a menudo disfruta de privilegios que no están disponibles para la población en general, lo que puede dar lugar a un sentido de injusticia y desigualdad.

Desigualdad de facto: A pesar de la promesa de igualdad en el comunismo, en la práctica, se ha observado que la élite gobernante disfruta de beneficios y lujos que no están disponibles para la población en general. Esto contradice la visión igualitaria del comunismo.

Falta de adaptación: Los sistemas comunistas tienden a ser rígidos y pueden tener dificultades para adaptarse a cambios en las circunstancias económicas y sociales. Esto puede llevar a la estagnación y la incapacidad para abordar desafíos emergentes de manera eficiente.

Aislamiento internacional: Los países que han adoptado el comunismo a menudo han experimentado aislamiento diplomático y económico por parte de la comunidad internacional. Esto puede dificultar el comercio y la cooperación internacional, lo que a su vez puede afectar negativamente la economía y la calidad de vida de la población.

Deficiencias en la provisión de servicios básicos: A pesar de las promesas de igualdad, en muchos sistemas comunistas, se han observado deficiencias en la provisión de servicios básicos, como atención médica y educación. Los ciudadanos pueden enfrentar largas listas de espera y una atención de calidad inferior.

Escasa diversidad de productos y servicios: La falta de competencia y de incentivos para la innovación en los sistemas comunistas puede llevar a una escasa variedad de productos y servicios disponibles para los consumidores. Esto puede resultar en una falta de opciones y en la dificultad de satisfacer las preferencias individuales.

Dificultades para mantener el orden y la estabilidad: En algunos casos, los regímenes comunistas han tenido dificultades para mantener el orden y la estabilidad, lo que ha llevado a conflictos internos y revueltas populares.

Es importante destacar que no todos los defensores del comunismo creen que estos problemas sean inherentes al sistema en sí mismo. Algunos argumentan que estos problemas surgieron debido a la implementación incorrecta o corrupta del comunismo en lugar de ser problemas inherentes a la ideología. Además, existen variantes y reinterpretaciones del comunismo que buscan abordar algunas de estas críticas, como el comunismo democrático y el socialismo democrático.

En resumen, el comunismo ha sido objeto de críticas significativas debido a problemas prácticos y éticos asociados con su implementación histórica. Las opiniones sobre el comunismo varían ampliamente y dependen de la interpretación y aplicación específica de sus principios en contextos concretos. Es importante considerar tanto las críticas como las defensas del comunismo al evaluar su validez como sistema político y económico.
